1º andar com seis quartos amplos, tendo um deles WC privativo, e um partilhado. R/C Sala de jantar, estar, cozinha que permite confeccionar as refeições, 1 WC e jardim exterior.
Recebemos com conforto, confiança e segurança.

It can host up until 5 people, it's perfect for a family or group of friends that are looking for private and exclusive experience in the nature. It is is equipped with a private kitchen and toilet, and you can park just besides it.

The space
Quinta das Relvas’ eco-hostel is located on an XVIII century eco-farm managed by a NGO with the same name dedicated to non-formal education activities on Arts and Sustainability. Our eco-hostel follows the same aims: to offer a more sustainable and creative experience in the heart of nature!

This eco-house is equipped with a private kitchen and toilet, two couple's bed and a sofa bed.
There is parking space just beside it.

Our surfcamp is located in a traditional fisherman village, surrounded by the wild and well preserved uncrowded beaches of natural parks and many surf spots.

The surf Camp is only a 3 minute walk from the beach. Perfect for a quick surf session at our home beach, beautiful sun sets or to go for a drink at the beach bar.

Outside is a big lounge area to hang out and relax.

It's possible to surf whole year round, so you are more than welcome to visit us and experience the surf life in Esmoriz!

name: Double Bed in B&B Ocean Breeze near Porto
description:
Welcome to Oceanbreeze Esmoriz!

Mild temperatures, warm summers, good surfing conditions, a calm and relaxed environment and just half an hour drive to Porto – a beautiful, interesting and buzzling city in Portugal – you can find our Guesthouse in the cute town of Esmoriz.

Birds whistling, the salty breeze of the ocean in the air and big forests, dunes and beaches closeby, ready to be explored – by foot or with a bicycle free of use.

We offer SURF and YOGA classes with qualified instructors.

Casa S. Félix (S. Félix House) is located in a small village called Gondifelos. It stays about 35 minutes away from Porto's city center and 10km away from the amazing beaches of Póvoa de Varzim and Vila do Conde. Here, you'll have a wonderful view of the green fields that surround the house, where you'll be able to take a walk or simply ride a bike and explore the nature. Outside the house you'll find stone table, where you can enjoy your meals and a swiming pool for a good day of sun.

The space
Featuring 3 bedrooms with 3 double beds, the ample Casa São Félix has a living room with sofas and a fireplace, TV, equipped kitchen, 3 bathrooms and a terrace. The property also enjoys views over the garden and the swimming pool area. There is an outdoor stone table which is shaded by the garden’s trees. There guests can enjoy their meals, which can be prepared either in the fully-equipped kitchen or the outdoor barbecue facilities.

Guest access

name: Dunas Beach Apartment | 3 min praia
description:
Apartamento acolhedor, 50 m2, situado a 3 min a pé da praia de Esmoriz.
Perto de supermercados, restaurantes, cafés, etc.
Esmoriz é a cidade perfeita para caminhar, andar de bicicleta e para a prática de Surf.
Se quiser fazer uma caminhada, opte pelos magníficos Passadiços da Barrinha ou pela extensa área florestal e ciclovia, se desejar andar de bicicleta.
Se procurar relaxar, visite o Parque do Buçaquinho.
Se for adepto de desportos náuticos, tem ao seu dispor várias escolas locais de Surf.

The house is 5 minutes walk to Cortegaça’s train station which quickly connects to the city of Porto (35minutes) or Aveiro(30 minutes)!

name: * Maria´s House * Casa da Maria
description:
The space
In a beautiful rural village, we find the Maria´s House, a place to rest and contemplate nature.

Warm and maintaining the original of Portuguese villages, Maria´s House is the simplicity of life.

Stone house, fully rebuilt, with love and affection, has a charming double bedroom and 1 bathroom.

Ideal for romance, sightseeing, know the area, go for a swim in the river (with river beach) and wake up the adrenaline in various sports.

With a superb surroundings, you can enjoy nature in all its fullness and take time to savor the cuisine of this region.

Enjoy relaxing and living relaxed as Maria advises.

Aveiro is 50kms, 60kms Viseu and Porto to 80kms, by car.

name: ICH Inveja Country House - Quarto do Granito
description:
The Inveja Country House is a farm that is characterized by its historical and family atmosphere, with more than 200 years of existence, combined with the comfort of today. Its main activity is aimed at the production of milk, so it is possible for guests to contact animals.

The space
Outside, there are century-old trees and green gardens, where you can stroll in peace.
The decor of the rooms is modern combined with rustic elements. Some of the rooms have a view of the garden and a small romantic lake. In the main room, the "Castle tower", you can enjoy a night in the light of the stars, through a stunning skylight. All rooms have a private bathroom, with all amenities at your disposal. Access to the Wi-Fi network is free.
The car park is private and free on site.

Guest access
Living Room, Games Room and Outdoor Garden.

name: Beach Front 1 Bedroom Guest House.
description:
The space
Fully furnished beach front 1 bedroom guest house (linens and towels included), 1 bathroom with shower, cable TV. Sleeps 2 adults and 2 children.
House has a small private garden with chairs to work on the tan or simply relax.
Walking distance you can find restaurants, bakeries, cafés and a supermarket. We can also provide 2 bikes for your daily exercise (upon request and on availability basis).
Car parking is available on the street in front of the house.
There is a train station (1.5km from the house) that can connect you to Porto (~30km away) and/or the airport.
There is also a surfing school 20 meters away that rents equipment. Other activities/sports nearby include golf, horseback ridding, tennis and sailing.
The house is located in a very quiet, peaceful area literally steps away from a beautiful beach.

description:
Studio Open Space, Loft em frente ao oceano Atlântico, praias de areia fina, óptimo para a prática de Surf. Piscinas privativas de adultos e crianças, vistas de beleza sem igual, com o mar, a praia e as piscinas a seus pés. Terraço fantástico em toda a frente da casa com total privacidade, com duas cadeiras longas para desfrutar do sol, mesa e cadeiras para fazer suas refeições ao pôr do sol ou relaxar. No último andar de condomínio fechado com elevador. Privacidade

name: Lindíssima Vivenda em Ovar/Furadouro com Piscina
description:
Este espaço abriga quem precisa de abrigo, protege quem precisa de um tempo. Repleta de vidros, recebe em si o sol e reflete-o no jardim e na sua piscina grandiosa onde este texto nao é fiel na variedades espécies que o contemplam. Nos seus quatro quartos e duas salas, estende-se de braços abertos a quem nela quiser ser abraçado. Ao mesmo tempo não deixa de ter um ar maternal que uma casa e lar merecem ter. Uma semana ou um mês, as vivencias que lá se viverão ficarão para sempre na memória!

description:

The space

tradição e a modernidade, traduzem-se em Conforto e Bem-Estar, para que na
sua estadia possa descansar e conviver. Situada na aldeia
de Eiriz, a 30 km da cidade do Porto, Guimarães, Braga.
Tem vários trilhos entre eles o da nascente do rio Leça onde podem conhecer uma das belezas naturais conhecidas na região como as "QUEDAS DE FERVENÇA".

name: Bungalow on a Manor with Pool and Garden
description:
The holiday bungalow (about 70 m²) is situated on a property with a renovated villa (finca) from the 19th century near Aveiro (25 km), Porto (50 km) and Coimbra (65 km). Directly in front of the door there is a large garden with swimming pool and a terrace with barbecue and seating. In addition, the 6000 m² park offers the possibility to take small walks and recreation in the nature.

The space
The Bungalow on the Quinta Outeiro da Luz is a studio apartment with a small kitchen, a dining area, a seating area and two single beds that can be used as a double bed. A corridor leads to the 2 bathrooms.

The Quinta Outeiro da Luz is an estate with a renovated mansion built around 1850.

name: Quarto-Suite na Cidade de Vizela Rainha das Termas
description:
Quarto-suite com bom espaço, cerca de 16 m2 incluindo casa de banho. O quarto possui ar condicionado, televisão por cabo com cerca de 70 canais, chaleira para fazer chá ou café, uma cama de casal e uma janela ampla que fornece boa luminosidade. O quarto de banho tem uma cabine de duche com boas dimensões e possui secador de cabelo.

The space
Quarto-suite na cidade de Vizela, conhecida pela Rainha das Termas de Portugal e agora também conhecida pelo seu Bolinhol de Vizela, que foi eleito recentemente como uma das 7 maravilhas doces de Portugal. Dista cerca de 8 Km de Guimarães, 20 Km de Santo Tirso e Vila Nova de Famalicão, a 28 Km de Braga e a cerca de 42 Km da Cidade do Porto e do Aeroporto, fica também a cerca de 40 Km das praias de Póvoa de Varzim e Vila do Conde. tem acesso as Auto-Estradas A3, A11, A7, A42 e A4. Birds whistling, the salty breeze of the ocean in the air and big forests, dunes and beaches closeby, ready to be explored – by foot or with a bicycle free of use. We offer SURF and YOGA classes with qualified instructors.

The space
Our property offers a big garden, where you can relax under the pavillon, in the hammock or on the meadow; where you can pick fruits from many trees or make a barbeque and eat on the terrace. If you need a cool down just jump in our pool.
If you are seeking for an active vacation or want to try out something new, we offer different activities such as Surfing, Stand Up Paddle, Kite Surfing, Yoga, Skateboarding or Volleyball.

Situated 200 meters from the train station, 2 km from Esmoriz beach and 50 meters from the Nature Reserve.
A 22 km from the city of Porto.

The space
The house is located in a quiet area, set in a fauna and flora enviable, which allows simultaneously share the sea, the green lagoon and various birds (ducks, flamingos eagles, crows, storks, swallows, etc.) that migrate in own time of year.
It is 2.5 kilometers from the beach of Esmoriz.
The beach Esmoriz, of fine white sand is lapped by the Atlantic Ocean with calm waters, clear blue so it is a zone of summer par excellence, tens of thousands of people visit in the summer months.

name: São Braz Terrace
description:
Casa rústica com terraço e piscina sazonal
Encontra-se inserida numa bonita e histórica paisagem rural do Minho e muito perto das principais cidades do norte como o Porto, Braga, Guimarães. As praias estão apenas a 30 minutos de distância.

The space
A São Braz Terrace situa-se junto à antiga Capela de S. Brás e a 60 metros do Mosteiro de Landim, que é um mosteiro românico datado do século XII. É uma casa rústica, em pedra, com 2 quartos, 1 casa de banho e 1 cozinha.

Apesar de ser uma casa antiga, encontra-se devidamente equipada e com todas as comodidades. O quarto de casal possui uma janela que dá para um terraço exterior, muito bonito. No exterior, existem artefactos rurais e um tanque, onde antigamente se pisava o vinho da Casa de S. Brás e que atualmente é utilizado como piscina (15m2), nos dias de Verão.
Tem uma cozinha rústica, totalmente equipada e com um fogão em pedra, a lenha, onde antigamente se cozia o pão. Em frente, encontra-s

Living room with TV.

name: A casa da Quintinha da graca 1°andar
description:
O primeiro andar para os hóspedes foi totalmente remodelado por mim e decorados com muito amor e carinho, tem pormenores que fazem a diferença.
O res do chão é aonde eu habito. A frente da casa tem o jardim para os hóspedes, na parte de trás e todos os lados circundantes é aonde os animais habitam e formam a Quintinha. Todos os animais vivem livres nesse espaço. Tem ainda uma parte para as crianças brincarem, tem tendas, podem , andar de skat ou patins, etc. Terão momentos inesquecíveis

The space
Os quartos são temáticos e decorados com carinho cada um . A sala é grande, a cozinha também, tem animais do lado de fora, mas meigos e domesticados.
A quintinha é na cidade. Dormir na cidade e acordar no campo com o cantar dos galos.

Guest access
O primeiro andar é todo para os hóspedes, têm acesso aos animais e podem inter hajir com eles. O resto está vedado, só vão lá se quiserem

name: Beachliving Cabana
description:
Beachliving Cabana é uma casa com características únicas para uma familia passar uns belos dias de férias num ambiente calmo e bastante descontraido.
Na casa Beachliving Cabana pode disfrutar de um jardim bastante espaçoso com uma agradável piscina e relva verdejante. É o espaço ideal para apanhar sol durante as tarde quentes de verão, e, ao final do dia acenda umas brasas no grill e faça um jantar alegre e divertido com toda a familia no páteo exterior, acompanhado de um bom vinho.

The space
A área envolvente da casa é agradável e bastante calma, toda com a mesma arquitetura.
O silêncio é uma contante durante todas as horas, e o cantar dos pássaros ao final do dia são um momento de relax total.
Venha e disfrute deste ambiente maravilhoso junto à praia.

A casa Beachliving Cabana está decorada para proporcionar aos nossos clientes o máximo conforto e bem estar durante a estadia.

Shining view in the city heart 1

The space
#IF THE DATES YOU WISH AREN’T AVAILABLE, PLEASE, CHECK BELOW ON THE RIGHT SIDE OF THIS PAGE, WE HAVE OTHER OPTIONS IN THE SAME BUILD, AT THE RIGHT PLACE! THANKS#

Recently renovated apartment with modern architecture in an old building, in the heart of Oporto, with the Douro River and the wine cellars of Porto on its feet. Upon arrival you will feel the comfort of a real home prepared specially for your needs.

The apartment is located in an iconic building 2 min walk from the famous Ribeira with its restaurants, bars and boat trips, 2 min from the cathedral and 7 min from São Bento station.

apartment

self-catering

name: Home in the geographic center Porto
description:
Very confortable and nice house, Metro station in front direct to everywhere -old center-8 min, airport-16 min, beach-10 min; Casa da Música-5 min walking.
Safety parking in the gate for your car
We stay in the house next yours to help if you want

The space
Confortable house with 2 bedrooms, living room, kitchen and toilet, garden with barbecue, garage, in the center of Oporto.We stay in other house, side by side with this one, to give you all atention you want.
We like to meet people, come stay with us and know us.
In front of the Metro station that takes you straight to the old center(8 min), the airport(20 min), train station, beach(12 min), port wine cellars(12 min), casa da música(5 min walking)...
We speak English, French and Spanish.

Guest access
We have "pasteis de nata" and Port wine for your wellcome!

description:
The space
The apartment have 1 bathroom, have wireless, and you can use the kitchen ( we don't serve break-fast ).
Have a balcony for smokers.

It is very easy and quick to arrive in my Guest-House from the Airport.

From the Airport, guests can catch the metro directly to Trindade metro station ( main metro station ).

The Guest-House it is 5 minuts walking to Trindade metro station ( city center ) and 10 minuts walking to Avenida dos Aliados-main avenue.

Guest access

name: RIVERTOP by YoursPorto
description:
Located on the Douro River, this bright apartment redecorated with bright colors, natural light and the perfect atmosphere to spend a perfect vacation or weekend.

The view from the apartment is fabulous on the riverside area of the city of Porto.
It can accommodate up to 4 guests with all comfort in the heart of the city.

The space
This apartment is great for both a weekend getaway and a longer vacation.
A bright apartment with breathtaking views right on the river.
Open space kitchen with a spacious living room, and a bedroom with bathroom, with a light decoration that combines the old with the recent, just like the Ribeira area.

Guest access
Access to all areas of the apartment is restricted to guests as well as the use of all equipment of the apartment is arranged.

name: Apartment near to Port Wine Cellars
description:
Este é um apartamento idealmente bem situado. Daqui obtém-se vistas maravilhosas, quer seja durante o dia quer seja à noite. Próximo, está o teleférico, os barcos para passeios no rio, as caves de vinho do Porto, restaurantes e... o Porto.

The space
Apartamento c/ três quartos. Um c/ cama de casal, outro c/ duas camas individuais e o terceiro c/ uma cama de solteiro possui também grande janela e uma varanda de onde se pode desfrutar ainda melhor a belíssima paisagem envolvente. Todas as janelas dos quartos e da sala são duplas. Quarto de banho completo e um WC de apoio. Cozinha equipada c/ placa eléctrica, todos os utensílios p/ cozinhar, máquina de sumos, cafeteira eléctrica, forno micro-ondas, torradeira de pão, frigrífico e máquina de lavar roupa. Salão p/ jantar e estar c/ grande janela c/ óptima vista p/ o Rio Douro e equipado c/ televisão. O edifício tem elevador. Idealmente bem situado em rua sossegada da zona histórica de Gaia, sobre as Caves do Vinho d
neighbourhood: Vila Nova de Gaia, Porto, Portugal

name: PENSÃO FAVORITA
description:
A Pensão Favorita situa-se no centro histórico do Porto, na rua Miguel Bombarda, onde a maioria das galerias de Arte estão localizadas e onde estas organizam uma abertura comum, com novas exposições, bimensalmente.
Tem doze quartos independentes, cafetaria com esplanada e jardim.
Na casa principal localizam-se: sete quartos, a receção, a sala-de-estar que dá acesso ao jardim e á cafetaria. No jardim localizam-se mais 5 quartos.
•Ano de Construção: 2010
•última remodelação: 2018

The space
A Pensão Favorita é uma Casa onde qualquer pessoa se pode sentir bem-vinda, graças a uma seleção detalhada de objetos e referências, onde se mistura o mobiliário moderno e peças vintage.
O hotel foi pensado de forma a oferecer uma boa dinâmica tanto nos espaços públicos como na organização dos quartos e áreas privadas.

Guest access
As áreas comuns são: a sala de estar, a cafetaria, a esplanada e o jardim.

Other things

- Bathroom is private

It's a welcome place.

The space

- The room has recently been refurbished but retains the original wooden floor and of the wooden doors. It is situated on the middle floor in a three-story house.
- On the same floor there are two more guest rooms, a kitchen and a living room overlooking the garden, these spaces are shared.

name: Porto Leça Beach Flat in Matosinhos
description:
The space
Welcome to our apartment, near "Leça da Palmeira" city beach, that was recently renewed and it´s situated in Matosinhos Area/ Porto District:
- 8 minutes walking to Leça beach;
- 20 minutes to Airport, by car;
- 15/20/30 minutes to Porto downtown, by car/taxi, bus or metro, respectively (depending on traffic).

The apartment overview is relaxing with lovely front and back gardens. There're also lots of shops around the apartment block (cafes, grocery and bakery stores, hairdresser and beautician, etc.) and the shopping mall with cinema and IKEA is about 2 km. You have great connections to O´Porto downtown from bus and taxi terminals near Leça Church (about 5/10 minutes walking from the fact) and from "Mercado" metro station (about 20-30 minutes walking from the flat).
Apartment w/ 1 car parking garage.

Guest access

name: Dream corner by waterfalls, 20 min to Porto- Ap3
description:
Discover this incredible corner with almost wild nature and several waterfalls and pool, at only 20 minutes from Oporto.

The space
Mr. Osório, the proud owner and concerned host, will show you all the spots of this property of 22.000 m2.

This studio apartment is taking advantage of the amazing view over the river and waterfalls.

It has a double bed and a closet. On the living room area, there is a small sofa-bed. A kitchinete will allow you to prepare an easy meal, while for more ambitiouse cooking, you could use the common kitchen, on the property.

The private bathroom has a tub and hot water.

Although all the spaces have central heating, you will find a cozy fireplace on the apartment.

If you still haven’t decided yet, just let me tell you how welcoming host you will have on Mr. and Mrs. Osório, that fall in love with this place several years ago and since then, completely changed their life in order to

name: Big House Near Porto and beachs
description:
The space
Maison de campagne sur deux étages avec jardin sur propriété privée très spacieuse.


Petit potager et arbres fruitiers qui régaleront les plus gourmands.


Portail automatique pour rentrer les voitures et système d'alarme.


Il y a quatre chambres qui peuvent être utilisées contenant chacune un lit double, un grand placard et un fauteuil.
Dans l'une des chambres il y a une salle de bain avec toilettes et baignoire et les deux autres pourront se partager une salle de bain avec toilettes et douche.
Une troisième salle de bain se trouve au rez-de-chaussée contenant douche et toilettes.


Il y a un grand salon avec une bibliothèque très bien fournie avec des livres en français, un lecteur de DVD et un lecteur de laser Disc, une petite chaîne hifi, un babyfoot et une télévision avec chaînes câblées.
Il y a deux grands canapés 3 places et une cheminée.

name: Studio in  Porto
description:
Localização excelente no centro do Porto e lugar muito seguro.

The space
No alto do Porto, no centro histórico à Praça da Batalha fica este estúdio muito luminoso.
O estúdio tem duas camas individuais que podem ser unidas, cómoda e guarda-fatos. Na área da cozinha há um fogão, frigorífico, micro-ondas e demais utensílios de cozinha. Há ainda uma zona de refeições. Há internet e TV-Cabo. Na casa de banho há um duche, máquina de lavar roupa. O lavatório é separado.
O Largo Actor Dias fica mesmo ao lado das antigas muralhas fernandinas e do funicular que desce em direção à Ribeira. Seguindo em direção ao centro chega-se à Praça da Batalha e daqui a Santa Catarina e à baixa do Porto. Aqui encontra tudo o que precisa para uma estadia fantástica a descobrir o Porto, já que pode passear pelo centro, tem restaurantes e bares por todo o lado; lojas, centros comerciais, etc.

Private studio fully equipped with seating for four people. Garden and swimming pool at 1km from the beach. Ideal to discover the city of Oporto and the incredible beaches of northern Portugal. laundry & cleaning services.
restful

The space
Ideal for a family holiday in the north of Portugal - this home offers guests the opportunity to enjoy the best that this region can offer .
Just two kilometers from the renowned beach of Espinho and 15 minutes by car or train from the historic centers of cities of Porto and Gaia offers its guests the pleasure of the discovery of two cities UNESCO world heritage site and the tranquility of the beaches and coastline northerner .
By being out of the loop Urban , this house encourages relaxation, tranquility and privacy indispensable in the holiday mood .
It is involved in this familiar environment we offer our guests the traditional Portuguese cuisine providing them meals and only reserved .

name: 4 Bedroom Apartment  - Porto
description:
The space
Quietly located just a 10-minute walk away from Casa da Música Concert Hall, this stylish apartment features 2 spacious balconies. Free Wi-Fi, parking and laundry facilities are available.

This modern apartment features four large bedrooms, each with a comfortable double bed. The master bedroom boasts its own private balcony with views of the surrounding area. Relaxation can be found in the living area, which is softly furnished and contains a flat-screen TV. The kitchen is fully fitted, and there are 2 bathrooms.

Guests can enjoy views of the surrounding area from any one of the 3 balconies. A number of cafes and restaurants can be found in the nearby area, and the famous Casa da Música Concert Hall is a mere 10-minute walk away.

Casa da Música Metro Station is just a 5-minute walk away, and the nearest bus stop is just 10 metres away.

name: Amazing River Views - charming Studio
description:
A cozy studio in the heart of Ribeira de Gaia, surrounded by porto wine cellars, restaurants and handcraft shops is the best place to stay and enjoy the World Heritage area.
It is located near the famous bridge D. Luis, in front of the river and offers incredible views over Ribeira and Douro River.

We speak Portuguese, English, French and Spanish and we are happy to host you!

The space
2 guests or even 4, could comfortably stay in this studio with a double bed and a sofa-bed, separated by a folding screen. You will have here sheets and towels, fully equipped kitchen with dining area, as well as a private bathroom.
Air condition will climatise the space, altough the proximity of the river and the ocen will moderate the temperatures, both in summer and winter.

name: CHARMING ATTIC ROOM & WC + GARDEN
description:
An attic almost like an apartment:big room, bathroom, and no one else in that floor
Access to garden & kitchen (just for breakfast, not for cooking), and very nice bakery around the corner.
Walk downtown, metro&bus everywhere (including airport&ocean)
Romantic, perfect for 1 couple!

The space
This attic on the 3rd floor of our house is almost an apartment for guests: a big room (15 m2), a bathroom, and an extra room (15m2) if you need it.
In case you are more than 2, the extra room is available to comfortably accommodate everyone.
Towels and linen are included.

Guest access
The house has 3 floors, and the room is on the top floor.
There is a garden behind, a hidden secret perfect for an early morning tai-chi or a cold beer before dinner
The hosts can use the kitchen (fridge and microwave) for breakfast (not for cooking, sorry).
Wi-Fi included.

Restaurants, bars and boutiques, as well as pharmacy, cafés and Oporto´s fine bakeries are all around the corner. You´re close to everything.

name: Vitória - Central and Rustic Studio
description:
The space
This apartment consists of a kitchenette (equipped with fridge, microwave, 4 ring electric hob and oven, provided all kitchen utensils), living room with sofa bed, open bedroom with double bed and bunk bed, bathroom with shower. The studio is heated and the bathroom has a towels warmer. Can sleep 4 people. We have cots available.
Lovely place, where we can open the window and feel the essence of Porto. Full of details that recall the history of the city. Ideal for a holiday in the center of Porto.
It is situated in the heart of the city, in the historic area, named World Heritage by UNESCO.
Is close to the main city attractions. A 5 minute walk from the Ribeira, the Clerics Tower and Avenue of the Aliados. In próximidades the accommodation can also find restaurants, bars and a shopping area.
Close links with buses, metro and trains.

name: FOZ DO DOURO HOUSE
description:
The space
Detached villa with sea and river situated in Vila Nova de Gaia. Really next to Oporto City and very close to many beautifull beaches with BLUE FLAG quality.
The house is really next to the mouth of Douro river, with an amazing view, and nearby of Porto wine cellars and next to the typical fishing village of Afurada.

The house has 4 floors, an attic with terrace and a basement with direct garden access.
There are 3 bedrooms ( 1 single bed suite ; 1 double bedroom ; 1 child bedroom ) 1 living room with fireplace, TV & DVD player. 1 Completely equipped kitchen.
All linen and towels are provided and with request we can provide one more single bed.
There is a 18km boardwalk with a cycle track and a pedestrian promenade along the seaside.
You can enjoy the sea and river breeze by using the cycle track or the pedestrian promenade for enjoying breathtaking view of "Ribeira", considered world heritage of humanity by UNESCO.

name: RIVERFRONT APARTMENT IN CENTER OF PORTO
description:
Newly refurbished apartment providing wifi, tv cable, cozy, modern & relaxed atmosphere. Guaranteed to be an unforgettable travelling experience providing a unique riverfront view of the Rabelo boats navigating the river Douro and Port Wine Cellars.

The space
The Rabelo boat is a traditional Portuguese boat, which for centuries held the job of transporting people and goods along the river Douro. It is native of the Douro region, it exists nowhere else in the world. Its history is closely linked to the production and trade of Port Wine. Although no longer in use, we can still admire these graceful vessels belonging to Port Wine Companies on the banks of the River Douro, in the cities of Porto and Gaia.

The apartment is at the heart of the historic center of Porto between the monumental Customs Congress Center and the Ribeira area that is declared a UNESCO World Heritage Site. The Rabelo apartment is a 2º floor, one bedroom apartment newly refurbished pr

The apartment is located in the neighbourhood of Port Wine lodges, still not very touristic with friendly locals.
It's perfect to discover the city, visit Port lodges and make cruises in the Douro river.
You also have:
- Balcony with lovely views to Douro river and Historic Centre
- Fast Wi-fi for free
- Free and easy parking
- Welcome pack: milk, juice, ham, cheese, bread, water, tea, coffee, ....
- Air conditioned in the 2 bedrooms, each bedroom has private bath and balcony

The space
- Sunny and spacious apartment of 100m2
- 2 double bedrooms, 2 private bathrooms, 2 balconys
- Lovely views to Historic Centre and Douro river from one balcony
- Full equipped kitchen (stove, oven, micro-wave, refrigerator, coffee-maker, kettle, toaster, dish washer, washing machine, plates, glasses, pots, ...
- Living room with table for 4 pax, 2 sofás, Sony cable TV with 100 international channels
- Bed sheets and towe

name: Basic Studio With Top Location and View . Carmo 3
description:
Cosy and modern studio with the best location you can ask for! Situated in Carmo area, classified by UNESCO as World Heritage Site, you will be walking distance from all the main landmarks, the iconic Torre dos Clérigos and the beautiful blue tile wall of Igreja das Carmelitas are steps away. Lello bookshop is just across the square! No excuses for not being the fist in line!
Adults only. 19337/AL

The space
Our studio is located on the 3rd floor of a 19th century building. Excels in natural light and fantastic views over the square and churches.
Very simple, but functional, everything you may need for your stay, fits in 18 square meters.
The kitchen is fully equipped, with a electric stove, fridge, freezer, pans and pots, cutlery and a table for two where you can enjoy the flavors of Portugal.
A comfortable double bed (140x200cm) will be always waiting for you in the after a day exploring the city.

name: Chalé encantador, de estilo rural
description:
Extraordinário chalé com piscinas privativas para crianças e adultos, integrado em quintinha de 2500 m2, relvada e com árvores fe fruto e bosque. Área muito tranquila, verdejante, com bons acessos, distando somente 10km de praias da Costa da Prata de Portugal. A cidade do Porto, cujo centro histórico é reconhecido pela UNESCO como Património Mundial, dista 30km. A cidade de Aveiro, conhecida como a "veneza" de Portugal, dista 35km. A casa tem salão de estar, 4 quartos, sala de jantar e cozinha.

Other things to note
A utilização da piscina encerra de 1 de Novembro a 30 de Abril
A casa possui um equipamento de SPA (jacúzi) opcional cuja disponibilização carece de solicitação expressa e tem um custo adicional de 15€ por cada hora de utilização.

The apartment is part of a famous housing complex designed by renowned architect Álvaro Siza Vieira. The “Lapa” metro station is a 2min walk away and you can get from the airport in 20min. Oporto is famous for its food, wine and architecture like "Casa da Música" which is 10min walking away or the river side “Ribeira” which you can walk to in a very interesting 30min downhill stroll. You can walk all over the city from the apartment, then jump the metro back at the end of your days exploring.

The space
The apartment is set in the “Bairro da Bouça” housing complex, design by Álvaro Siza Vieira. This housing complex is mandatory in people visiting to see the style and buildings of Porto architectural guide. Set in a quiet neighborhood, you will find residents who live there since the 70’s, as well as young musicians, artists, designers and architects. It’s a cool and sought after place to live and has a great reputation.

name: PORTO PENTHOUSE - Suspended Bed and Terrace
description:
The fusion of traditional and contemporary architecture. Suspended bed and terrace

The space
In a full restored building, Porto Penthouse has an excellent terrace with sweeping views over green gardens of Priorado Square (Largo do Priorado) and the oldest church in Porto - Church of Cedofeita, giving a feeling of great openness, not usual in the urban Porto tissue, mostly defined by narrow streets. The terrace is equipped with garden furniture suitable for dining and enjoying moments of relaxation and outdoor recreation. Inside the paradox between the traditional and the contemporary is revealed. In this open space stands a suspended bed, the center piece for a new experience. The bathroom is lined with innovative building materials generating unusual environmental atmospheres. It is equipped with facilities like LCD 32", Cable TV, high performance air conditioning, combi oven, induction hob, wireless internet and small appliances (no washing machine).

name: City Silhouette
description:
The space
City Silhouette is a beautiful and joyful apartment that gives great comfort to those who seek it. Perfect for 4 to 6 people, located right in the heart of historical centre of Oporto. From this apartment you can see the city silhouette with all its roofs and several monuments like the Teatro de São João, Câmara Municipal do Oporto (City Hall) , Torre dos Clérigos and Mosteiro de São Bento da Vitória. The amazing D. Luis Bridge and Sé Catedral is just a few steps away, literally, with one of the most stunning views the city can give you. If you cross the bridge and catch the Teleférico de Gaia (chair lift) you can visit the many Caves de Vinho do Oporto located in Gaia. If you want to go to the beautiful Ribeira (River Douro) you can walk for 2 minutes or catch the Funicular dos Guindais (cable railway) which is 50 meters from the apartment. The São Bento Metro and Train Station is just 50/150m away, respectively, which is perfect wherever you come from and wan

name: Porto_Loft
description:
i am a designer and i love to surf. i live in a recently restored house near the serralves contemporary art museum in Porto. The house is great, but a little big, only for me, in this life moment . Then i thought why not share, and meet nice people.

The space
Modern and cozy room. The house was 2 floors, the first have 2 rooms, bathroom and a wide entrance hall, the other is a open space loft (living/ dining-room with a kitchenette) with a nice fireplace. Also a wide terrace with a great view. (Private room the other house areas are shared)

Other things to note
You can visit Serralves contemporary art museum that was designed by architect Siza Vieira in a one of the nicest gardens that we have in Porto. (7 minutes walking from the house). And if you like you can go to Matosinhos Beach near the Porto city Park, surfing, jogging or enjoy the sunset in a great esplanades.(3km from the house)

Right in the heart of the city with great access and in an area with all kinds of restaurants and services, Old Fabulous World keeps all the original Portuguese design in a protected building over 200 years old, where the Portuguese writer Joaquim Antunes Leitão was born in 1875. This apartment has been decorated in a very personal and welcoming way, and is also a second family residence.

The space
Old Fabulous World is an apartment with a maximum capacity for 4 people, with two bedrooms with a double bed. The apartment has a complete bathroom with shower and a service bathroom, a living / dining room with a kitchenette equipped with a stove and oven.
We have an iron and ironing board at your disposal inside your apartment. Bed linen, towels and shampoo are included in the stay.
We can provide a bed, bath and baby chair if requested.
Air conditioning system that also provides heating of the apartment in winter, as well as a pellet stove.

name: The Getaway Van - POSEIDON
description:
We are a campervan rental service located in the North of Portugal. With our vans, travelers explore at their own pace, with the freedom of having no ties and the assurance of a great service. Our mission is to provide the adventure of a lifetime!

We´re based in Porto, which is well served with flights (many of them low cost) from major European destinations. It offers a great starting point to explore the country, and specially the North. You can also travel through Europe (unlimited miles).

The space
This is a practical and economical solution for your adventure holidays. It allows you to travel independently, with privacy and without pre-defined travelling packs. Whether you want to visit the countryside, the mountains, the city or the beach, it´s your choice.

Our campervans are Ford Transits with economical Diesel engines and, in paid highways, they will pay smaller fees than a regular auto-caravan.

2 quartos para 2 pessoas cada e uma sala com um confortável sofá-cama de casal. O wc tem um aquecedor e secador de cabelo. Na cozinha há uma mesa de jantar extensível para 10 pessoas. Totalmente equipada, com fogão,forno,microondas, máquinas de lavar roupa e louça, frigorífico etc. Tudo o que é necessário para uma refeição. name: Apartamento em casa de charme - Porto 181
description:
Apartamento integrado numa casa do século XVIII situada no centro da cidade, numa zona onde pode encontrar restaurantes de gastronomia típica portuguesa e comércio tradicional.
Perto dos centros de diversão noturna apesar de se encontrar num local tranquilo.
Possibilidade de visitar a pé os principais monumentos e locais de interesse cultural (Catedral, Igreja de Santa Clara, Igreja de S. Francisco, Ponte D. Luís I, Biblioteca Municipal do Porto, Livraria Lello, Torre dos Clérigos, etc).

The space
Casa tradicional portuguesa que está na nossa família há mais de 200 anos.
Trata-se de uma construção sóbria e austera típica das casa da Região do Alto Douro.
É a única do conjunto de três casas iguais que existiam naquele local. Revela o modo de vida e cultura das gentes do Norte de Portugal.
Nesta casa cresci e aprendi com a minha família o gosto de bem receber quem visita a nossa cidade do Porto.

Right in the heart of the city, within Porto's World Heritage area and near S. Bento station, this cosy flat with free wifi is ideal for couples wanting to discover Porto historic centre, downtown and the riverside at a comfortable walking distance.

The space
OPO TRINTAeUM is a fully equipped studio, located in a recently refurbished historic building right in the heart of Porto.
Since it has been newly renovated, all the apartment is very comfortable, practical and modern. Its big kitchen has all the regular electrical appliances (stove, microwave, laundry and dish washer) and it also includes a nespresso coffee machine, a kettle and a table for two. It is perfect for a quick breakfast but also for long and more elaborated meals, prepared with local products that can easily be found in the nearby delis and traditional grocery stores.

name: Oporto Cozy Bungalow
description:
Enjoy the peace and the local culture of the countryside so close to a big centre of OPorto city! The time is all yours!

The space
The bungalow / shelter itself is situated inside a little urban farm 100% sealed and safe, and it has a double bed (we can add one single bed), a bathroom equipped with toillet sink and hot shower.
If you are in a camping mood, there is also space to place 2 tents and barbecue facilities.
You can also enjoy the placidity of the small farm in the company of our permanent guests.. the dog, the horse, the ducks and other surprises!

Guest access
There is a private parking inside the farm, with a limit up to 10 vehicles, including 4x4, trails, motorbikes, campervans.
We have also two bicycles available.

Other things to note
-Pets allowed
-Suitable for small groups of travelers and adventurers

name: Historical center beautiful ap
description:
Totally renovated apartment near Clérigos tower. One bedroom with double bed and a couch for two in the most interesting neighbourhood in town! The apartment will be the perfect home to your stay in my beautiful town. Welcome!

The space
This is a brand new duplex apartment. It is part of a totally renovated two floors house. We kept the feeling of old and got the comfort of modern. Downstairs you can find a lovely kitchnet with a dinning and living room and a bathroom. Theres a bed sofa for two people. Upstairs there's a bedroom with a double bed and a window with one of the most amazing views in town. Come check it out!

Guest access
We have a kitchen with stove, microwave, fridge and everything you need for a nice meal. We have wifi. All the apartment is exclusively for the guests. Tea, coffee, cookies and a welcome drink is on the house!

MUNICIPAL TOURIST TAX
As of 1 March 2018
What is the tourist tax for?
To consolidate Porto as an attractive and sustainable city.
Who is required to pay the tourist tax?
Anyone older than 13 years, staying a night in Porto, pays the
tax per night, per person for a maximum of seven straight
nights per person and per stay.
Who is exempt from paying the
tourist tax?
a) People travelling for medical treatment, and continue therapy
in medical facilities. Family members and/or companions

name: Santa Catarina Downtown Apartment
description:
1 bedroom apartment for 4 people, in the city center, fully equipped, terrace of 10 m2 in a very peaceful area. Easy to walk to the historical center and the liveliest areas of the city.
Good choice for a pleasant stay.

The space
Apartment located in a quiet neighborhood in the city center. Close access (300 mts.) to the metro station and some of the main bus lines. Fast and easy access to the city center. On foot you can visit the historical center of Porto and the most lively part of the town, as Santa Catarina St., is one of the most emblematic, and located right in the heart of the city. Nearby you may find the famous Cafe Majestic, the National S. João Theatre, the Bolhão market and well known cafes and shops.
Although central, the apartment offers a calm and pleasant stay. The apartment is oriented to the east, with a terrace of 10 m2, from which you can enjoy views of the gardens and a green and sunny area.

quase não tenho palavras...

The space
Uma pequena casa térrea do século XIX, recuperada em 2015, inserida num bairro operário habitado por pessoas idosas e alguns familiares, estando ainda algumas casas vazias. Quinta da Longra está a 10 minutos de carro dos Passadiços do Paiva, a 15 minutos a pé da ponte pedonal suspensa e a 23km de Arouca e seu famoso mosteiro. Caminhadas, miradouros deslumbrantes, rafting, caiaque, canyoning e várias praias fluviais no rio Paiva são algumas das actividades de que os hóspedes poderão desfrutar. Bons restaurantes, vinhos e licores locais e doces tradicionais são as atracções gastronómicas da região. O aeroporto do Porto fica a 70km, o rio Douro a 30 minutos de carro.

name: Attic suite with incredible view
description:
The suite we rent is located in a fantastic apartment in the historical city center, as defined by UNESCO. The apartment draws the perfect balance between the original Porto houses and new design, with a wonderful garden and an amazing view.

The space
The building in which the suite is inserted is a XVII century building, newly renovated for full contemporary standards, located in one of the most historical streets of the "old city", with to major landmarks in the street (now converted to a theatre and a museum). The space
During the day you get to listen to the birds that live in the gardens around, and by night, if you are lucky, you'll have an owl.
The space has plenty of light, since it is oriented south, with 5 big windows all around (except north).
It is comfortable, since it was renovated completely.

The space
O apartamento situa-se na marginal de Vila do Conde, uma cidade histórica muito bonita. O pôr do sol visto da casa é maravilhoso, proporcionando um final do dia muito relaxante.
Nas varandas, pode tomar o pequeno-almoço com a família, apanhar sol ou relaxar.
A sala de estar possui uma lareira para dar aconchego durante os tempos mais frios do ano.
Tem os dois quartos com cama de casal, virados para a rua (um, com varanda), com muito Sol. A cozinha para além do frigorífico, placa de indução, forno e microondas, possui também, máquina de lavar louça e roupa.
Está totalmente equipado e mobilado, pronto a receber-vos.

Este estabelecimento possui Livro de Reclamações Electrónico.

Quinta da Avessada is a small Rural Tourism property located in Rossas, Arouca municipality, on the banks of Urtigosa river and close to the limpid rivers Paiva and Paivô. description:

The garden gives direct access to the beach.Perfect for children cause theres no cars passing by..
Facing the sea you have a litle terrass ...

The space
This is a tradicional house from the seaside. Me and my daughters have been triyng to make it cosy but still keep its original character.
The ambience is a mix of a fishermans house and a summer house by the sea.
We kept the white wooden furniture in the kitchen and the hall.
Is a perfect space, not modern, but with soul. Both couples or families will find it , we hope , a special space. Children can easily and safely play since theres no cars

description:
Venha descobrir a cidade do Porto e acompanhe o prazer dessa descoberta através de uma experiência única e diferente; uma estadia num veleiro de 16 metros (51 pés) que lhe oferece todas as comodidades necessárias para passar uns dias inesquecíveis.

Venha descobrir a cidade do Porto e acompanhe o prazer dessa descoberta através de uma experiência única e diferente; uma estadia num veleiro de 16 metros (51 pés) que lhe oferece todas as comodidades necessárias para passar uns dias inesquecíveis.

name: Aniki Porto Riverside
description:
Enjoy this 3 bedroom apartment where you have fabulous views over the Luis I bridge, the river Douro and the port wine lodges.
It's located in the historic city centre, in a quiet neighbourhood. Most of the main touristic attractions are at walking distance and you can also find public transportation (metro, train, bus) nearby.
It has a spacious living room and can accommodate up to 6 guests.

The space
The building is located in the historic city centre, on the hill, halfway between the Cathedral of Porto and Luis I bridge, in Ribeira. To the apartments there is pedestrian access only, along 80 steps/stairs, (please see last photo on the website) either down from the Cathedral or up from the river. It may be a drawback if you have mobility concerns, but it does afford you privacy, peacefulness and fabulous views in one of the most genuine quarters of Porto :-)

Other things to note
Discounts apply on weekly and monthly rates.

The space
Our studio is cosy, comfortable and sunny. It is as central as it gets and has a unique view on the most iconic church of the city and its tower (Torre dos Clerigos). Inside of the UNESCO-listed neighbourhood, it is a perfect place to experience both traditional Porto and the most dynamic parts of the city.

The studio is on the 3rd floor of a tastefully-renovated 19th century building (no lift). It has a practical open kitchen with a stove, a microwave and a fridge, and a bathroom with a shower. There is a humble and cosy bed (see pics) and everything else you could need for two people to live comfortably. The flat will be cleaned for you and we will provide fresh bed linens, towels and our own little map of favourite places in the city.
